segments.text: We still have one more day to go before we return home . What will we see tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no idea . We've enjoyed both the natural scenery and the city sights . What else is there to see ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes . I heard there's a lager motor company nearby which open to the public every weekend . We can go to see how a car is manufactured and learn more about the automobile industry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: good idea ! I've always been interested in that . How much is the entrance fee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure , but as far as I know , most factory tours are free . They are sponsored by the company providing the tour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: really ? What do the companies do that for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe most of them think of it as good public relations . They can promote their product and make their company better-known .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , i see . So factory tours are good for companies as well as visitors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do we need an appointment beforehand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll call the tourist information centre to check .
segments.speaker: S1
